name: Faulty Fliers & Bad Bombers
description:
A very janky game. You could say the development was,technically "Out of Control"... :P. Game was made under 48 hrs for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Control your plane(just barely) and try to bomb your targets to get a high score. Key word here being try...

Astonish your friends! Shock your family and bask in wonderment!(?)

Enjoy!
